briefTitle: Evaluation of Efficacy and Safety of BF-200 ALA Used With Photodynamic Therapy in Patients With Actinic Keratosis.
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Phase III Multi-Center Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of BF-200 ALA Versus Placebo in the Treatment of Actinic Keratosis (AK) When Using PDT
summary: The aim of the study was to evaluate the efficacy and safety of BF-200 ALA (Ameluz) used with photodynamic therapy (PDT) in patients suffering from actinic keratosis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Total Patient Clearance Rate 12 Weeks After the Last Photodynamic Therapy (PDT)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 12 weeks after the last photodynamic therapy (PDT), up to 24 weeks
